radirius.merc.geometry

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • radirius.merc.geometry.Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Line, Point, Polygon, Rectangle, Triangle

    public class Shape
extends Object
    The abstraction of all shapes.
    Author:
    wessles

        The center of mass. Basically the mean location of all vertices.

        The rotation angle (in degrees, COS screw radians)

      • Shape

        protected Shape(float... coords)
        Parameters:
        coords - The coordinates of all vertices in the shape. Will be parsed for every 2 values into a Vec2.

      • translate

        public Shape translate(float x,
              float y)
        Moves all vertices by x and y.
        Parameters:
        x - The amount every vertex should move on x.
        y - The amount every vertex should move on y.
        Returns:
        Me

      • translateTo

        public Shape translateTo(float x,
                float y)
        Moves all vertices to x and y.
        Parameters:
        x - Where every vertex should move relative to the nearest point of the shape on x.
        y - Where every vertex should move relative to the nearest point of the shape on y.
        Returns:
        Me

        Parameters:

        origy - The origin's y.
        angle - The angle by which the object will rotate relative to the origin.

      • clearParent

        public Shape clearParent()
        Makes me an orphan. Parent will lose me from it's arraylist of children, so there is no trace of my previous life ;(.
